general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Venus brings a gentle and comforting atmosphere. Taurus individuals feel an increased need for stability and beauty in their daily lives. It is a day to refocus on what is truly important.
love: Express your emotions sincerely and listen to your partner.
work: Take the time to evaluate your projects before making important choices.
health: Incorporate a relaxation practice to soothe your mind.
advice: Listen to your heart, it always knows where to go.
